trans-unit.source: Serves as the base class for design-time data source view classes.
trans-unit.target: Serve como a classe base para classes de vista de origem de dados de tempo de criação.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView"></xref> class using the specified data source designer and view name.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView"> </xref> classe com o nome de designer e a vista da origem de dados especificado.

trans-unit.source: The parent data source designer.
trans-unit.target: O estruturador de origens de dados principal.

trans-unit.source: The name of the view in the data source.
trans-unit.target: O nome da vista da origem de dados.

trans-unit.source: owner is -or- viewName is .
trans-unit.target: owneris -or- viewName is .

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"></xref> object supports the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteDelete*> method.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref> objeto que está associado a atual <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"> </xref> objeto suporta o <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteDelete*>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteDelete*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteDelete*> method is supported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteDelete*>método é suportada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteDelete*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"></xref> object supports the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteInsert*> method.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref> objeto que está associado a atual <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"> </xref> objeto suporta o <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteInsert*>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteInsert*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteInsert*> method is supported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteInsert*>método é suportada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteInsert*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"></xref> object supports paging through the data that is retrieved by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect*> method.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref> objeto que está associado a atual <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"> </xref> objeto suporta paginação através dos dados que são obtidos pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect*>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if paging through the data retrieved by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect*> method is supported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a paginação através dos dados obtidos pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect*>método é suportada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"></xref> object supports retrieving the total number of data rows instead of the data itself.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref> objeto que está associado a atual <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"> </xref> objeto suporta a obtenção do número total de linhas de dados em vez de dados propriamente ditos.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if retrieving the total number of data rows is supported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se tentar obter o número total de linhas de dados é suportada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"></xref> object supports a sorted view on the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref> objeto que está associado a atual <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"> </xref> objeto suporta uma vista ordenada na origem de dados subjacente.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a sorted view on the underlying data source is supported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se uma vista ordenada na origem de dados subjacente é suportada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"></xref> object supports the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate*> method.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref> objeto que está associado a atual <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"> </xref> objeto suporta o <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate*>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate*> method is supported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate*>método é suportada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the designer that created this <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma referência para o estruturador que criou este <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner"></xref> object provided when the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView"></xref> instance was created.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner"> </xref> fornecido um objeto quando atual <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView"> </xref> instância foi criada.

trans-unit.source: Generates design-time data that matches the schema of the associated data source control using the specified number of rows, indicating whether it is returning sample data or real data.
trans-unit.target: Gera dados de tempo de criação que corresponde ao esquema do controlo de origem de dados associada utilizando o número especificado de linhas, que indica se está a devolver dados de exemplo ou dados reais.

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of rows to return.
trans-unit.target: O número mínimo de linhas a devolver.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the returned data is sample data; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to indicate that the returned data is live data.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para indicar que os dados devolvidos são dados de exemplo <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para indicar que os dados devolvidos são dados dinâmicos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> object containing data to display at design time.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref> objeto que contém os dados para apresentar no momento da concepção.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the view as provided when this instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView"></xref> class was created.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome da vista fornecia quando esta instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView"> </xref> classe foi criada.

trans-unit.source: The view name.
trans-unit.target: O nome da vista.

trans-unit.source: Gets a schema that describes the data source view that is represented by this view object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um esquema que descreve a vista de origem de dados que é representada por este objeto de vista.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceViewSchema"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceViewSchema"> </xref> objeto.
